quotes.text: My power has brought you thus far.
My ability has won the day.
Lean on me, and you shall prevail.
I have defeated the mighty foe at last.
I release you from my service.
I release you from my service.
I release you from my service.
The old magicks are still strong.
The mystical ways of old are best.
The magicks are strong in you.
You follow the paths of the old ones.
By the power of the magicks, we will rise again.
We must seek out that beacon!
A beacon to channel the magicks!
Even the mightiest are no match for the old magicks.
The ancient magicks draw me ever onward.
The ancient magicks draw me ever onward.
The ancient magicks draw me ever onward.
Not a care in the world!
True protection does not rely on mere sight.
My sight is nothing, and everything.
I see nothing; I see all.
I see every flock on every world.
You won't always be so lucky!
Oh my wormlings, come to mother!
Ready or not, here I come!
Poor, misguided pilot, whom I must crush. Such a waste of humanity!
Unfortunate fool! A pity that I must destroy you.
Iron legions! Please destroy this newly-arrived member of the miserable Galactic Assault Squad!
It is to my great regret, dear pilot, that I must inform you of your imminent demise.
Sadly, your lack of vision has sealed your doom. Farewell!
Regretfully, I have ordered your destruction. Goodbye!
I shall crush you and the rest of the Galactic Assault Squad under my bootheels!
I refine humanity; mercy is weakness!
I protect humanity with a shield of iron!
I meet external threats with internal steel!
I burn out the impurities of the human race!
I steel us all for the struggle to come.
All will obey the Iron Commander!
I am the shield of humanity. I alone!
It is my destiny to command the armies of humanity.
I cull the weak, I forge the steel!
I cull the weak, I strengthen the bloodlines!
I forge the steel, I protect the bloodlines!
I purge weakness, I hammer the iron!
I purge the unfit; I advance the human race!
For humanity, I take the necessary actions.
Steel your hearts with courage and resolve!
Hilt and pommel, guard and blade!
Shield and sword, breastplate and greaves!
Through fire I refine the human race.
For the sake of humanity, none must oppose me!
I rule to protect humanity from external threats.
To protect us, I must purify the human race!
I alone shall rule the world!
Humanity is weak; I alone can fix it!
I regret to announce that I must crush the Galactic Assault Squad.
Galactic Assault Squad, surely by now you realize there is no escape.
Congratulations, Iron Legions, on the destruction of yet another member of the pathetic Galactic Assault Squad.
Now, Galactic Assault Squad, you will understand the true nature of power.
And now, Galactic Assault Squad, I will show you true power.
Galactic Assault Squad, prepare yourselves for a true demonstration of power!
And now, Galactic Assault Squad, I shall demonstrate true power to you!
At last, Galactic Assault Squad, you shall taste my true powers!
Galactic Assault Squad, you will regret this day for the rest of your very short and painful lives!
You have bested me this time, Galactic Assault Squad, but I shall return!
This minor setback will not derail my plans. Mark my words, Galactic Assault Squad!
You have won this battle, Galactic Assault Squad, but I will be back!
Do not think, Galactic Assault Squad, that you have seen the last of me!
Galactic Assault Squad, I shall never stop my quest to protect humanity!
You have won this battle, but I shall never relinquish my destiny as the shield of humanity!
Even in defeat I remain ever and always defiant! I am the shield of humanity!
There was never any hope for you, Galactic Assault Squad. My victory was assured from the start!
There was never any hope for you. Poor, poor Galactic Assault Squad.
Once again the weak and ineffectual Galactic Assault Squad finds itself defeated. How typical, how sad.
Galactic Assault Squad, once again you find yourself defeated. Pathetic.
Galactic Assault Squad, your miserable little rebellion has failed. Again.
Ah yes, the pathetic Galactic Assault Squad. Vanquished again!
I am a being of pure energy.
The power! It courses through me!
Let us plant the seeds of life.
Let us go forward and spread life.
I am one with the flames.
Dragon claw, dragon fire, dragon heart.
Do not meddle with my affairs!
The dragon nature is strong in you.
You have survived the trial of fire.
The dragon fire burns within you!
I go to spread the flames. Farewell!
I go to spread the flames. Farewell!
I go to spread the flames. Farewell!
Now we're really going to cause some trouble!
Oh boy oh boy! Let's go!
We shall grow together, you and I.
Only inside, will you find what you seek.
Already have, that which you need.
Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
Balance and equity, the keys to a peaceful universe.
The beacon of justice shines bright.
I shall continue the fight for equality and justice.
I shall continue the fight for equality and justice.
I shall continue the fight for equality and justice.
Always, there is always a chance.
I don't believe in no-win scenarios.
Dead? Yes. Powerless? See for yourself!
It is not so bad, being dead.
Death has not quenched my flames!
Feel the heat of my flames!
The fires shall consume you all!
I shall blaze a trail to victory!
Burn a path to that beacon!
A mother's love knows no limits.
I care for all my children.
Yes, yes, the bones grow stronger!
You're too fast! I'm so hungry!
Mere foes will not stop us.
No enemy will ever end our voyage.
This is but a minor setback.
A light to guide our travels!
The end comes for us all.
Discover what lurks in the shadows.
I can't wait to get started!
Time to show the universe what we're made of!
I am here, right by your side!
Ahh yes, another ill-bred mongrel of the Galactic Assault Squad.
Another detestable little pilot of the Galactic Assault Squad.
Cavaliers! Dispatch this loathsome peasant of the Galactic Assault Squad.
Royal Cavaliers! Evict this foul intruder from my presence.
Redcoats! Remove this odious pilot from my sight.
Ah, Galactic Assault Squad. Have you come to bow?
Another pilot of the Galactic Assault Squad come to kneel?
Another roguish blackguard of the Galactic Assault Squad? Amusing.
Galactic Assault Squad? Well, may the best monarch win.
Ahh, another Galactic Assault Squad peasant for me to crush.
I'll say this slowly so that even you might understand. Die. Peasant.
Another foul-smelling pilot for me to scrape from my shoe.
Surrender before my grandeur; spare yourself some agony.
Galactic Assault Squad? What balderdash, what absolute poppycock!
It's good to be the king.
I am your Lord Protector Sir John Cromwell, and you will bow.
I will rule. You will bow.
No sun shall ever set upon my empire.
From Arthur, to good Queen Bess, to me.
My subjects! How I loathe them.
Oh, how I abhor the peasantry.
My subjects, what a detestable rabble.
Valet, bring my tea and biscuits!
Bow down before your Lord Protector.
Great-uncle Oliver would be so proud!
Someday England will have a King John II. Me.
Like Yorktown at Cornwallis, I shall conquer all.
Like Gentleman Johnny at Saratoga, I shall triumph.
I shall lead England to glories not seen since the Somme!
I have every right to rule. It's in my blood.
Fear not, your destruction will come swiftly and mean little.
Have you not yet realized just how outclassed you are?
You are but a footnote in the glorious history of me.
You face His Majesty's Royal Cavaliers! Surrender now!
I eat ham and jam and spam a lot.
You face a future king of England!
I have been divinely appointed to crush you.
Keep calm and kiss your backside goodbye.
Yes, it is not unknown for commoners to feel a sense of awe in my presence.
I'm here to teach you proper manners in the presence of your betters.
Filthy peasants, cleanliness is next to godliness, which is next to me.
It is I, your ruler! Bow down before me, peasants.
The burden of rule falls once again to a Cromwell.
If you feel the need to weep in my presence, I understand.
My majesty is beyond you, no doubt.
You shall address me as Your Majesty.
Let's make this quick, shall we? I have an appointment with Earl Grey.
You come at the king, you best not miss.
You make me sad. So be it!
And I didn't even spill my tea.
One more foe conquered, one more step towards glory.
And so ends the folly of the Galactic Assault Squad.
Bravo lads, now let us retire. Cucumber sandwiches all around!
Britannia rules the waves! The space waves!
Lizzy, old bird, I've failed you.
You fools! Who will lead you now?!
Bested by peasants!? What would Arthur think?!?
Lizzy! Has it come to this?
Oh Uncle Oliver! How I wanted to make you proud!
Uneasy lies the head that wears a crown.
I think I'll go for a walk...
There are hidden strengths in all of us.
Not all powers are easily seen.
Wait'll they get a load of me!
The world is such an amazing place!
This adventure is really getting good!
A chance for a new adventure!
I like to be under the sea.
Bubbles, bubbles, I've got no troubles.
Floating and gliding, slipping and sliding!
We shall be so happy, you and me.
One two three, master of the sea!
You're so brave, under the wave.
Three four five, it's good to be alive!
Twelve eleven ten, it's time to try again.
What's that light, all shiny and bright?
A beacon in the sea, for you and me!
Forget the rest, you're the best!
They'll have to catch me first!
'Tis a fine day for sail, or a fight!
I've got a veritable feast prepared!
Strive forward, and I will safeguard you.
I help those who help themselves.
I give freely of the waters of life!
To all who come, I give the waters!
I share the waters with all!
The life-giving waters, they belong to us all!
I take that which I need to survive.
So much to do! So little time!
Fully fledged and ready to hunt!
The butcher has become the butchered.
Let us stalk our prey together.
Through the hunt we prove our worth.
Enough! I shall seek my revenge elsewhere!
Enough! I shall seek my revenge elsewhere!
Enough! I shall seek my revenge elsewhere!
I will make one hundred friends today!
Look at that sky! Hello sky!
That's what you deserve you big bully!
Pick yourself up! Dust yourself off!
Don't take me pot o' cold!
Call me a runt! I dare you!
The bigger they are, the easier for me to kill!
I eat big galoots like you for breakfast!
Oh, you think you're special now?
Not so big now are ya?
You big dumb galoot, you almost died!
Shut yer yap and go get that beacon!
This just makes me even more annoyed!
Well done, little fly. Now step into my parlor.
You have evaded the trap, little fly.
Ensnared by a web of deceit.
Time to put some rounds downrange.
Atomic batteries to power, turbines to speed!
Kick the tires and light the fires!
Fangs out, squaddie! Go get em!
Firewall those throttles! Go get em!
Excellent! We'll put that to great use!
That's going to make a junior tanker very happy!
Another battle-hardened unit for the arsenal. Fight on!
Excellent work, tanker! A medal well deserved!
Outstanding work, squaddie! You earned it!
A medal for meritorious conduct by an outstanding tanker! Congratulations!
Absolutely outstanding! A well-earned accolade for gallantry!
An accolade for exceptional conduct, well-earned by an outstanding tanker!
An absolutely inspired piece of work! You earned it, tanker!
Superb work, tanker! Absolutely off the charts!
Masterful, incredible, absolutely first-rate! Galactic Assault Squad!
A magnificent, stellar job, absolutely deserving of an accolade!
Oh no! It's an event boss!
Go get that event boss, squad!
Ladies and gentlemen, I give you the Galactic Assault Squad!
Mess with the best, die like the rest!
Great shot squad! That was one in a million!
That's a W! Galactic Assault Squad!
Justice is written in the stars.
May the stars shine on you.
The stars rain down vengeance on the unrighteous.
The stars shine bright upon you!
Do not fear. Justice shall be served.
We must seek out that guiding star!
No one escapes the justice of the stars.
I seek for justice ever anew.
I seek for justice ever anew.
I seek for justice ever anew.
Hey honey, nice to see ya!
Bless your heart, let's get you fixed up.
Isn't that just a ray of sunshine?
Oh darlin', you did so good!
See you next time, sugar pie!
See you next time, sugar pie!
See you next time, sugar pie!
Do not try to betray me!
If you cross me, I'll make you pay!
None can escape the fury of the storm!
The fury of the storm cannot be stopped!
Feel the power of the storm!
There is no mercy, only judgment.
All will be summoned for judgment.
The day of judgment is at hand.
At last you have earned a modicum of my respect.
A decision has been handed down.
By judge's decree, you will acquire that beacon.
Be it so recorded, the beacon is captured.
Be it so recorded, the beacon is captured.
Six of one half, dozen of the other!
More is less, none is all!
Left, right, low, high, oh my!
We'd better stay away from that!
There is nothing false about hope!
Do not attach yourself to material things.
You are more than mere atoms.
Listen to the voice of the wind.
Attend on me, and I will give you guidance.
Hear me, and I shall counsel you.
